name: Lynne Starr (prototype for side-scrolling shooter)
description:
The stars are right! When mild-mannered teaching-assistant Lynne Starr discovers that magic is real, she becomes locked in a struggle of cosmic proportions. Lynne must travel through dimensions of chaos and madness to discover the secret of the evil forces that threaten to conquer our world.

A side-scrolling shooter with a silver-age comic book feel, Lynne Starr is a prototype for a larger project. The game uses keyboard controls, and instructions are in the game.

Let us know what you think! I'd like to develop this into something bigger.
